title: corruption file
body: riot my client patch keep getting corruption file it force to fix everytime the match start after it fix i alway got freaking Leave buster What the heck men i didnt go anything wrong

replies.body: There might still be some corrupted files laying around even after you try to force that fix. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure everything gets installed freshly.
